properties.body:
GULF OF GUINEA.
EQUATORIAL GUINEA.
DNC 01.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 01 DEC
   BY M/V POLAR MARQUIS
   TOWING 12 8100 METER LONG CABLES.
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   02-10.0N 008-06.0E, 02-10.0N 009-41.2E,
   01-49.5N 009-41.5E, 01-39.5N 009-32.9E,
   01-33.9N 009-31.4E, 01-25.0N 009-22.0E,
   01-25.6N 009-16.8E, 01-25.0N 009-15.7E,
   01-21.8N 009-14.9E, 01-13.2N 009-16.3E,
   01-10.0N 009-14.5E, 01-05.0N 009-13.5E,
   01-05.0N 007-56.0E.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 02 DEC 18.
